Title: Zoom
Writer: Prashanth Raj (story), Prashanth Raj (screenplay), Prashanth Raj (dialogue), Prashanth Raj (lyricist), Pawan Wadeyar (lyricist), Kaviraj (lyricist)
Actors: Ganesh, Radhika Pandit, Kavya Shetty, Kashinath
Plot: Santhosh and Nayana are both creative directors at an advertising agency.Nayana is straight forward and believes in hard work,Santhosh is just the opposite.What happens if these two contradicting personalities fall in love with each other?
